instance_template: #const n=7. item(wolf; goat; cabbage). side(left; right). opposite(left, right). opposite(right, left). time(0..n).
generator: at(farmer, left, 0). at(I, left, 0) :- item(I). 0 { boat(I, T) : item(I), at(I, S, T) } 1 :- at(farmer, S, T), time(T), T < n. at(farmer, S2, T+1) :- at(farmer, S1, T), opposite(S1, S2), time(T), T < n. at(I, S2, T+1) :- boat(I, T), at(I, S1, T), opposite(S1, S2), time(T), T < n. at(I, S1, T+1) :- item(I), at(I, S1, T), not boat(I, T), time(T), T < n.

hard_constraints.description: The wolf and the goat are prohibited from occupying the same bank in the absence of the farmer's supervision.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(wolf, S, T), at(goat, S, T), not at(farmer, S, T).

hard_constraints.description: The goat and the cabbage are prohibited from occupying the same bank in the absence of the farmer's supervision.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(goat, S, T), at(cabbage, S, T), not at(farmer, S, T).

hard_constraints.description: The farmer is required to be positioned on the right bank at the terminal time step.
All transportable items are required to be positioned on the right bank at the terminal time step.
